WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
When the aero basic theme is enabled and you dock a ribbonwindow to the whole screen (maximized) the restore button doesn't work.
This only happens when the window is not yet maximized once by clicking the maximize button instead of docking the window.
 
Thank you
WorkItem.Summary: Restore button doesn't work when the ribbonwindow is docked to the whole screen in the aero basic theme.
